price: Say, “On the Day of Decision the belief of those who disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be given any respite.”
arabic: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul yawma al-fatḥi lā yanfaʿu alladhīna kafarū īmānuhum walā hum yunẓarūna
